<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt"> <x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <apitype>command</apitype> <model>gemma:2b</model> <prompt>I have a math question 5+4 is equal to ??</prompt> <python_script_name>c:\python\OllamaLangchain.py</python_script_name> <response>I'm here to help with your math problems! Is there anything I can help you with today?
Please let me know what you'd like to ask or what problem you'd like help with. I can assist with a variety of mathematical topics, including arithmetic, algebra, geometry, calculus, and statistics.
I can also provide step-by-step solutions to help you understand the concepts better.
Feel free to ask me anything!</response> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-05-10 17:57:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6da1349a0d0242107f44057211099c24</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-10 18:16:49</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_ollama_genai_prompt> </record_update>
